title: Hoeven Announces $400K in Federal Funding to Support Rural Development in North Dakota (John Hoeven)
text: ( Source : John Hoeven ) WASHINGTON - Senator John Hoeven, who serves on the U.S. Senate Appropriations and Agriculture Committees, today announced that the U.S. Department of Agriculture 's ( USDA) Rural Development has awarded two grants of
